title: My accounts email got changed and unverified

embed.description: Post with 2 views. email was changed and unverified

body:
Like you can see in the picture my email got changed and unverified, and now i cant acces my account anymore (iam posting this post from my smurf).
I trying to recover my account atm, but that is not the problem i have. The problem i have is that the rioter that is helping me is ignoring the fact that my email got unverififed aigan. Wich I though was to be impossible (or only possible by riot itself). Does this mean that a rioter hacked my account ?

PS: Iam not trying to accuse a rioter of stealing my account, I am only trying to know how this is possible because if its not possible then thats proof my account got hacked.

Kind regards,
Matteo

replies.body: It's most likely that someone was able to hack into your account and change that info either by knowing the login info or being able to verify themselves with your account information. I'd strongly suggest you hit up our account agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) by choosing the option "I need help recovering my account"!
